The photographs and letter were posted o: 2021, claiming that a bloodthirsty wolf was spotted in several locations in Pakistan.
The Urdu: language caption of the post translates to English as a warning about a dangerous animal named Keenya, which feeds on blood and has been sighted in multiple districts in Pakistan.
The letter accompanying the post appears: wildlife) of Bhakkar, confirming the sighting of the animal on the mentioned date.
The World Wide Fund for Nature: WWF) analyzed the photo of the animal and stated that it does not resemble a wolf but rather a Striped Hyena, which is found in Africa, Central Asia, and parts of the Indian subcontinent.
